text:
At CodeEval, we're hosting a bunch of coding challenges for companies that are hiring.

Warner Bros, Milo, DeviantArt, Shopply, Factual, Modcloth, Verical Brands, Rapleaf, Thumbtack, lolapps, Ampush Social, and Ravn

They're all hiring software developers, solve their challenge to apply, or do it just for fun!

www.codeeval.com
